name: Don't Wipe Out Dude!
description:
My final project for my second year of university. Surf endlessly and perform tricks till you run out of reputation! This is one of the largest solo projects I have made so far!

Apologies for not having the technical skill at this point to save the high score!

Hope you have fun with it, feel free to leave me a comment!

Controls: W, A, S, D, Arrow keys, Space
